attributes.action: Eastern High School - Time for a change
attributes.additional_details:
Since the merge of the 2 former high schools - Llanrumney & Rumney - merged, there has been nothing but problems.
My aim is to get the council to either A: Find different SAFER schools for our children. B: Re-open Llanrumney High School or C: Put in to place a security team to protect our children.
We need smaller classes, longer lunch break so that all children can eat and a secure enviroment for our children. We would like a parent/council meeting to discuss issues raised in the 14 days since the school has re-opened.
